home.title: EmpowerHub
home.subtitle: Go Nonotsha Basadi ka Thuso e e Kopaneng
home.tagline: Go nonotsha boikemelo, pabalesego le seriti.

financialSupport.title: Thuso ya Madi
financialSupport.description: Bona dikeletso tsa peeletso tse di rulagantsweng mo go wena mme o tsene mo dipuisanong tsa madi tse di nonotshang.

gbvSupport.title: Thuso ya GBV
gbvSupport.description: Bona thuso e e bonako le mafelo a a babalesegileng a bodulo fa o a tlhoka thata.

sanitaryAid.title: Thuso ya Phitlhelo
sanitaryAid.description: Bona mabokoso a dineelo a a gaufi le go fitlhelela didiriswa tsa phitlhelo tse di botlhokwa.

aiAssistant.title: Mothusi wa AI
aiAssistant.description: Bona dikarabo tse di bonako le kaelo go tswa mo tsamaisong ya rona ya thuso e e botlhale.

submitRequests.title: Romela Dikopo
submitRequests.description: Romela mme o latele dikopo tsa gago tsa thuso ka tsamaiso ya rona e e motlhofo go e dirisa.

aboutUs.title: Ka Rona
aboutUs.description: Ithute go le gontsi ka maikaelelo a rona a go nonotsha basadi mo Aforikaborwa yotlhe.

cta.title: A o Siametse go Simolola?
cta.description: Nna le dikete tsa basadi ba ba boneng thuso le nonotshego mo sethokgweng sa rona.
cta.button: Romela Kopo ya Gago ya Ntlha

about.title: Ka EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: EmpowerHub e nonotsha basadi mo Aforika Borwa ka go naya dikeletso tsa peeletso tse di rulagantsweng le dikopano, thuso e e bonako ya GBV le mafelo a botshabelo a a sireletsegileng, le phitlhelelo ya mabokoso a dimpho a boitekanelo. Tharabololo eno e e kopantsweng e bontsha boikano jwa rona jwa go nonotsha boikemelo, pabalesego le seriti.
about.missionText: Go tlhama sethala se se kopantsweng se se nonotshang basadi mo Aforika Borwa yotlhe ka go naya ditirelo tsa thuso tse di feletseng tse di lebisanang le boikemelo jwa madi, pabalesego ya motho, le ditlhokego tsa motheo tsa boitekanelo mo tharabololong e le nngwe e e fitlhelelekang.

financialEmpowerment.title: Nonotshego ya Madi
financialEmpowerment.description: Dikeletso tsa peeletso tse di rulagantsweng, dikopano tsa madi, le didirisiwa tsa go aga boikemelo jwa ikonomi.

gbvSupport.title: Thuso ya GBV
gbvSupport.description: Thuso e e bonako le mafelo a botshabelo a a sireletsegileng a basadi ba ba lebaganeng le tlhekefetso e e theilweng mo bongng.

sanitaryAid.title: Thuso ya Boitekanelo
sanitaryAid.description: Phitlhelelo ya dihlahiswa tsa boitekanelo tse di botlhokwa ka mabokoso a dimpho a a beilweng ka botlhale.

empowerment.title: Nonotshego
empowerment.description: Re dumela mo go nonotsheng boikemelo jwa basadi ka thuto, didirisiwa le thuso.

safety.title: Pabalesego
safety.description: Go netefatsa phitlhelelo e e bonako ya mafelo a a sireletsegileng le thuso ya basadi mo maemong a mathata.

dignity.title: Seriti
dignity.description: Go naya didirisiwa tse di botlhokwa fa go ntse go bolokwa seriti le sephiri sa mosadi mongwe le mongwe.

community.title: Setshaba
community.description: Go aga mafaratlhatlha a a nonofileng a thuso ka matsapa a a etelwang pele ke setshaba le tirisanommogo.

about.techDescription: EmpowerHub e dirisa thekenoloji ya sejoalejoale go naya sethala sa thuso se se kopantsweng. Pontsho ya rona ya gompieno e bontsha sesebeliswa sa modirisi le tiro ya motheo, le meralo ya go kopanya dikarolo tse di tswetseng pele tse di akaretsang:

currentFeaturesList.responsiveInterface: Sesebeliswa sa wepe se se arabang

futureFeaturesList.aiSupport: Thuso e e etelwang pele ke AI le dikeletso
futureFeaturesList.metamask: Kopanyo ya MetaMask ya dikgwebisano tse di sireletsegileng

about.demoNote: Pontsho eno e bontsha mogopolo wa tharabololo e e kopantsweng, e e rulagantsweng go letla tlhabololo e e ikemetseng ya dikarolo fa go ntse go bolokwa maitemogelo a modirisi a a tshwanang. Sebopego sa modular se letla dikatlego tsa bokamoso ntle le go kgoreletsa tiro ya motheo.

requests.title: Dikopo tsa Thuso
requests.subtitle: Romela dikopo tse ntšha le go latela tse o di nang
requests.noRequestsDesc: Simolola ka go romela kopo ya gago ya ntlha ya thuso
requests.name: Leina

req001.description: Ke batla keletso ya peeletso ya kgwebo e nnye

req002.name: Yo o sa itsegeng
req002.description: Ke tlhoka tshedimosetso ya lefelo la polokesego ka bonako

req003.description: Ke batla mabokoso a dineelo a a gaufi a dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo

finance.title: Nonotshego ya Madi
finance.subtitle: Fumana dikeletso tsa madi tse di rulagantsweng, ya kwa dikopanong tse di nonotshang, mme o age tsela ya gago ya boikemelo jwa ikonomi

seminar1.title: Basadi mo Kgwebong: Go simolola Peeletso ya Gago ya Ntlha
seminar1.location: Lefelo la Setšhaba la Cape Town
seminar1.description: Ithuta motheo wa peeletso le gore o ka simolola jang go aga leruo la bokamoso jwa gago.

seminar2.title: Workshop ya Boikemelo jwa Madi
seminar2.description: Mekgwa e e šomang ya go fitlhelela boikemelo jwa madi jaaka mosadi yo o ikemetseng.

seminar3.title: Tekanyetso ya Madi le Polokelo ya Bomme ba ba Ikemetseng
seminar3.description: Bokgoni jo bo botlhokwa jwa tekanyetso ya madi le maano a polokelo a a rulagantsweng bomme ba ba ikemetseng.

emergencyFund.title: Aga Letlole la Maemo a a sa Lebelelwang
emergencyFund.description: Simolola ka go boloka ditshenyegelo tsa dikgwedi tse 3-6 bakeng sa maemo a a sa lebelelwang.

education.title: Beeletsa mo Thutong ya Madi
education.description: Kitso ke maatla. Ithute ka tekanyetso ya madi, peeletso, le thulaganyo ya madi.

diversifyIncome.title: Farologanya Lotseno lwa Gago
diversifyIncome.description: Tlhama metswedi e mentsi ya lotseno go oketsa tsitsipano ya madi.

retirement.title: Rulaganya Bokhutlo pele
retirement.description: Go feta o simolola pele, go feta madi a gago a na le nako e ntsi ya go gola.

trackExpenses.title: Latela Ditshenyegelo tsa Gago
trackExpenses.description: Go tlhaloganya gore madi a gago a ya kae ke kgato ya ntlha ya go laola madi.

sanitaryAid.title: Thuso ya Phitlhelo & Tshegetso ya Tlhago
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Fumana dihlahiswa tsa mahala tsa phitlhelo le ditlhokego tsa tlhago mo mabokosong a rona a dimpho mo Afrika Borwa

capeTown.name: Lefelo la Setšhaba la Cape Town
capeTown.address: 123 Main Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
capeTown.description: Lefelo le legolo la setšhaba le le fanang ka dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo tse di botlhokwa mo basading ba selegae.

johannesburg.name: Lefelo la Basadi la Johannesburg
johannesburg.description: Lefelo le le ikanyegang go thusa basadi ka dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo le tshegetso.

durban.name: Lefelo la Boitekanelo la Durban
durban.description: Lefelo la boitekanelo le le fanang ka dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo le thuto ya boitekanelo.

tips.tip1: Fetola dipete kgotsa ditampone gangwe ka diura tse 4-6
tips.tip2: Tlhapa diatla tsa gago pele le morago ga go dirisa dihlahiswa tsa kgwedi
tips.tip3: Dirisa dihlahiswa tse di phepa tse di sa kotsi
tips.tip4: Boloka dihlahiswa tse di sa dirisiwang lefelong le le omileng, le le phodileng

tips.tip1: Tlhapa mmele o mogolo letsatsi le letsatsi ka sesepa se se bonolo
tips.tip2: Apara diaparo tse di phepa, tse di omileng
tips.tip3: Boloka lefelo la gago la poraefete le le phepa le le omileng
tips.tip4: Nwa metsi a mantsi le go ja dijo tse di nang le phepo e e siameng

tips.tip1: Masela a a phepa a ka dirisiwa jaaka kgetho ya nakwana
tips.tip2: Dijo tse di tsididi di ka thusa go fokotsa bohloko jwa kgwedi
tips.tip3: Metsi a a mogote a ka thusa go phomola mesifa
tips.tip4: Batla thuso ya bongaka fa go na le mathata a a sa tlwaelegang

donation.title: Neela Dihlahiswa
donation.description: Re amogela dimpho tsa dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo go thusa basadi ba selegae. Dilo tse di tlhokega thata:

items.sanitaryProducts: Dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo ya kgwedi (dipete, ditampone, dikomiki)
items.hygieneItems: Dilo tsa phitlhelo (sesepa, shampoo, borašele ya meno)
items.underwear: Diaparo tsa ka fa teng tse dintšha, tse di sa dirisiwang

donation.learnMore: Ithuta go Oketsa ka go Neela

gbvSupport.title: Thuso ya GBV & Mafelo a Polokesego
gbvSupport.subtitle: Thuso e e bonako le mafelo a botshabelo a a sireletsegileng a basadi ba ba lebaganeng le tlhekefetso e e theilweng mo bongng

emergencyAlert.title: Tshoganyetso ya Maemo a a Kotsi
emergencyAlert.description: Fa o mo kotsing e e bonako, letsetsa 10111 kgotsa o ye kwa polasing e e gaufi. Botshelo jwa gago bo botlhokwa.

safeHaven.name: Safe Haven Women's Shelter
safeHaven.address: 15 Protection Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
safeHaven.description: Botshabelo jo bo sireletsegileng jo bo fanang ka bodulo jwa tshoganyetso le ditirelo tsa thuso.

ubuntu.name: Ubuntu Women's Centre
ubuntu.description: Lefelo la basadi le le fanang ka thuso e e felletseng le bodulo jo bo sireletsegileng.

themba.name: Themba Safe House
themba.description: Ntlo e e sireletsegileng e e ikanyegang go thusa basadi le bana ba ba mo kotsing.

gbvCommand.name: GBV Command Centre
gbvCommand.description: Thuso ya tshoganyetso ya GBV ya mahala - 24/7

medicalSupport.name: Thuso ya Bongaka
medicalSupport.description: E leng teng mo dikokelong tsotlhe tsa bongaka

aiAssistant.title: Mothusi wa AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Fumana dikarabo tse di bonako le kaelo go tswa mo tsamaisong ya rona ya thuso e e botlhale
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Dumelang! Ke mothusi wa gago wa EmpowerHub. Ke mo go thusa ka dipotso tsa dikeletso tsa madi, thuso ya GBV, thuso ya phitlhelo, le ditirelo dingwe tsotlhe tsa thuso. Nka go thusa jang gompieno?

questions.financialSeminars: Nka fumana jang dikopano tsa madi?
questions.safeShelters: Ke kae moo nka fumanang mafelo a polokesego?
questions.sanitaryProducts: Nka fumana jang dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo?
questions.availableServices: Ke ditirelo dife tse di leng teng?

mockResponses.response1: Ke itumelela go go thusa! A o ka mpolelela gore o batla thuso efe?
mockResponses.response2: Dikopano tsa rona tsa madi di tshwarwa Laboraro le Labone. A o batla tshedimosetso e oketsegileng?
mockResponses.response3: Mafelo a polokesego a leng gaufi le wena a ka bonwa mo tsebeng ya rona ya mafelo. A ke go romele tshedimosetso?
mockResponses.response4: Dihlahiswa tsa phitlhelo di leng teng mo mabokosong a dimpho a a mo mafelong a mantsi. A o batla go itse gore ke kae?
mockResponses.response5: Potso eo e botlhokwa. Sethala sa rona se naya thuso e e felletseng ya ditirelo tsa madi, polokesego le boitekanelo.

aiAssistant.footer: Mothusi wa AI o leng teng go go thusa ka dipotso tsotlhe tsa thuso
